file_content.text: That's all the fuses down here. Next stop is someplace... exciting.
The encryption key is based on Koth's war record. Soldiers under his command who died. Stand by.
Traven. Nine-five-ninety. Explosive. Hoth.
Bridge controls are unlocked.
The Gravestone is mine.
We have lost five patrols in the lower decks--on opposite ends of the ship. Koth is not alone.
Oh, Father. You shouldn't have...
The next fuse is on the bridge with Vaylin and SCORPIO--and my crew.
Think how shocked they'll be to see us.
They won't be expecting us.
The bigger they are, the louder they scream...
You're okay, Len. Just a little... crispy on the edges.
Let's hit the bridge.
Focus on the bomb. I'll save your crew.
I'll protect your people.
We'll be too busy fighting and disarming your bomb to save them.
Your crew can save themselves.
I was gonna say you get Vaylin and I kill SCORPIO, but your plan works, too.
At least psycho princess and murder droid will be focused on us.
Not much of a silver lining, but I'll take it.
Jorul. Ten-eleven-ninety. Walker. Dantooine.
Frel. Four-seventeen-nine. Infection. Quesh.
